statements: UPDATE EnvironmentalHealthData SET pollution_level = 3.5, temperature = 25.7 WHERE country_name = 'USA' AND city_name = 'New York'
UPDATE EnvironmentalHealthData SET public_health_issue = 'High pollution levels' WHERE country_name = 'China' AND city_name = 'Beijing'
UPDATE EnvironmentalHealthData SET pollution_level = 5.7, public_health_issue = 'High pollution alert' WHERE country_name = 'USA' AND city_name = 'New York'
UPDATE EnvironmentalHealthData SET temperature = 28.5, public_health_issue = 'Heatwave warning' WHERE city_name = 'Los Angeles' AND country_name = 'USA'
UPDATE environmental_factors SET factor_value = 10.5, country = 'USA' WHERE factor_id = 1;
UPDATE public_health_issues SET cases_reported = 100, issue_name = 'Flu' WHERE country = 'UK';
UPDATE environmental_factors SET factor_value = 12.5, country = 'USA' WHERE factor_id = 1;
UPDATE public_health_issues SET cases_reported = 100, country = 'Canada' WHERE issue_id = 2;
UPDATE Environmental_Factors SET temperature=27.5, pollution_level=1.3 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Public_Health SET deaths=10, cases=50 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE Environmental_Factors SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 60.2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Public_Health SET cases = 100, deaths = 20 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE environmental_factors SET factor_description = 'Updated factor description' WHERE factor_id = 1;
UPDATE correlations SET correlation_value = 0.75 WHERE correlation_id = 2;

UPDATE EnvironmentalFactors SET temperature=25.5, humidity=60.8, pollution_level=3.2 WHERE country_code='USA';
